menu.name: &File
menu.menu: Creates a new project.
Opens an AHK file or Project for editing.
Opens an explorer window to the folder where the current Project is stored.
Closes the current Project. This will also close the parent project if you are currently in a Include.
Closes all of the open projects.

Saves all unsaved files. (All Projects and Includes are saved as well as backups of previous versions which can be accessed by using the Edit/Restore feature or by navigating to the directory where the Project is stored and then into the Backup directory)
Save the project As a new project. This will leave the old project in tact so you need to delete the old one.
Compiles all of the Includes of a Project and saves it to a file. (Does not make an EXE, Use Compile for that)
Creates a new Scintilla edit control.
Removes the current Scintilla control, You must have more than 1 or this will not work.
Creates a new Include for the current Project (adds an include)
Rename the current Include.
Removes a Include (include) from the project.
Provides a basic FTP setup to upload your Projects.
Saves all of the Includes (if you have any) into one script and places it into your clipboard so you can paste it on whatever forum, file, or website you like.
This will delete the current project, along with all Includes and Backups associated with the Project.
Opens a gui that shows the scripts you have closed.
Exits the program. This saves all of your edited files and saves the old version to %A_ScriptDir%\Backup.
You can add different file types that AHK Studio can open. This is done to keep you from accidentally opening media files that could crash Studio.

menu.name: &Edit
menu.menu: Opens a new dialog that allows you to bind a hotkey to any of AHK Studios menu items.
Inserts the current time in YYYYMMDDHH24MISS format.
Reverts to a previous point in the document history. (Same as Ctrl+Z)
Increments an integer where your Caret is located.
Decrements an integer where your Caret is located.
Redoes steps that you have Undone. (Same as Ctrl+Y)
Cuts the currently selected text to the clipboard. (Ctrl+X)
Copies the currently selected text to the clipboard. (Ctrl+C)
Pastes the contents of your clipboard into the current Include or Project at the caret position. (Ctrl+V)
Adds the currently selected text to your Personal Variable List.
Creates a duplicate of the line that your caret is in, or if you have text selected it will duplicate that.
Deletes the current line where your Caret is located.
Selects the next duplicate word or words that you have selected.
Shows an InputBox for you to enter the text to replace the currently selected text. Will work with multiple selections.
Shows a dialog to add replacement text to. Eg. (g,Gui) would replace lower case g with Gui if you type (" ",",",or "(") after it.
Adds a new Include to your project using the currently selected text.
Creates a new Include (Include) using the current word where your Caret is located. It will also create a function with the same name.
Adds or removes ; at the beginning of a line. You can use Edit Comment Insert to change it to whatever you like.

This option is mainly used for those who decide to turn off Full Auto. It indents your code by Blocks (code between { and }) but will also move all indentations of anything outside of code blocks to the left.

menu.name: Spacing
menu.menu: Adds spaces after commas in selected text.

menu.name: Add Space Before And After Commas

menu.menu: Adds spaces before and after commas in selected text.
Adds spaces before commas in selected text.
Will remove all spaces from the selected text.
Removes all spaces from around commas.

menu.name: Folding
menu.menu: Folds all available folds.
Folds only the lines that are in the current fold level.
Allows you to choose what fold level to fold. Each indentation is a fold level.
Unfolds all folded lines.
Unfolds all of the folded lines in the current level.
Unfolds the lines from the entered level.

menu.name: &Search
menu.menu: Shows a list of all of the Scintilla Controls and you can choose which one to focus.
Searches through all of the Includes under the current Project for specified text and displays the results. Select the result you wish to jump to and press enter.
Jumps to the next selected text.
Jumps to the previous selected text.
Searches for a search string and allows you to replace it with another string.
Displays a dropdown list of all of the text in that document.
Opens a dialog to ask what line you would like to go to.
Sets focus to the Quick Find edit control. This searches through the current Include (Include) using normal or Regex search. Use the CheckBoxes next to it to change the behavior.
Opens the Omni-Search window with ^.
Opens the Omni-Search window with ^. (Same as Jump To Include)

menu.name: Jump To
menu.menu: Wherever your caret it within a word you can jump to the Class associated with that text.
Wherever your caret it within a word you can jump to the First Available Text associated with that text.
Wherever your caret it within a word you can jump to the Function associated with that text.
Wherever your caret it within a word you can jump to the Include associated with that text.
Wherever your caret it within a word you can jump to the Label associated with that text.
Wherever your caret it within a word you can jump to the Method associated with that text.
If your caret is near a Brace (Either {} or also () <> []) it will place your caret near the matching item.

menu.name: Omni-Search
menu.menu: This will bring up a list of all of your Classes and Functions and insert a call to it in your code.
Opens up the Omni-Search window with #.
Opens up the Omni-Search window with {.
Opens up the Omni-Search window with ^.
Opens up the Omni-Search window with (.
Opens up the Omni-Search window with &.
Opens Omni-Search with <.
Opens up the Omni-Search window with @.
Opens up the Omni-Search window with [.
Opens up the Omni-Search window with nothing entered.
Opens the Omni-Search window with .
Opens up the Omni-Search window with :.
Opens the Omni-Search window with %.

menu.name: &Tools
Add Selected To Project Specific AutoComplete

menu.menu: This will add the selected text to the Project Specific AutoComplete list.
Nearly identical to Personal Variable List but this allows you to have words in the Auto Complete that are specific to that Project.
Compiles the current project and places the exe file in the project directory. If the file upx.exe is in the AHK Studio directory it will also compress it.

menu.name: Debug
menu.menu: Debugs your current script using the debugging engine.
Debugging: Stops the debugger.
Debugging: After you Debug the current script you use this to run the code.
Does the Step Into function for debugging.
Does the Step Out function for debugging.
Does the Step Over function for debugging.
Debugging: Shows a dialog with the current variables and their values.
When you hit a breakpoint while debugging this option will re-focus AHK Studio if it is taken away.
Starts Debugging with the Variable Browser automatically open.
Executes the current Project.
When you run a script using AHK Studio it keeps track of the processes. This will allow you to kill those running processes.
Executes whatever selected text that is in the current Include.
If you create a comment block with usable code and then Run Comment Block it will run what is inside that comment block.

menu.name: Run As
menu.menu: Executes the current Project using the Ansii binaries.
Executes the current Project using the U32 binaries.
Executes the current Project using the U64 binaries.

menu.name: Backup and Restore
menu.menu: Works pretty much the same as Full Backup but removes all previous Full Backups.
When you have your Project working properly you can do a Full Backup and it will get rid of all of the backup files that you have made since the last Full Backup.
Brings up a dialog containing all of the backup files of the current Include. You can browse through the list of backed up Includes and then you can restore them to a previous state.

menu.name: Bookmarks
menu.menu: Opens a dialog so you can manage your bookmarks.
Add a bookmark.
Delete a bookmark.
This edits the custom bookmark.
Jumps to the next bookmark.
Jumps to the previous bookmark.

menu.name: P&lugins
menu.menu: This will download plugins.
Will reload Studio.
Similar to Publish but this will also get the lib functions that you do not make an #Include call to.
Camel Cases Selected Text.
AHK Studio keeps track of the cursor position for all of your files. As you delete or change the names of your projects this position data becomes obsolete. This option gets rid of it.
Compiles your script using Unicode 32. Same as Compile if you use the 32 bit install of AutoHotkey.
Folds all text that can be folded.
Folds the current line.
If you have multiple selections of Value1 it will increment all following selections to Value2, Value3 and so on.
Combines all selected lines with a , between them.
This will trigger all of your files to save the current state.
Pastes the current project to p.ahkscript.org
Pastes your clipboard to p.ahkscript.org
Removes lines that are blank (`n`n)
Removes all text between /* */ and all ; comments
Will dynamically run the current Include
Plugin: Will split a line (or at least attempt to) by significant ,'s
Plugin: Gets rid of the window caption
Plugin: Allows you to create and maintain a Github Repository
Allows you to edit the Syntax, Colored Text, and Auto Menus without having to worry about an update changing things.
A small Scintilla window that allows you to test some code
Allows you to add your own personal variables to the program so when you type it will bring them up along with the standard commands.
A place to store code snippets [Video Here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=URk_C9fE-Ok&list=UUK-F1YEzAYtczSuMxwPaRtw)
Opens a dialog for creating a MsgBox.
Opens a dialog to upload your script to Github.
Dialog for entering your Github information.
Currently Unavailable.
Currently Unavailable.
Dialog for adding your own FTP servers so that you can upload your code using File/Upload.
By default ( enters ), { enters }, < enters >, ' enters ', " enters ", and enters . This dialog will allow you to edit that functionality.
Re-organize the menus, change hotkeys, and quick access to the options.
Duplicate menu item that I haven't removed yet...
Opens a Google search with the currently selected text.

menu.name: O&ptions
menu.menu: Enables Word Wrap.

menu.name: &Auto Indent
menu.menu: Keeps ;Comment Lines indented as well as normal lines.
Keeps track of the indenting of your script.
Without this option the Scratch Pad creates a local file on your HDD
Allows you to edit past the end of a line ==Word Wrap Removes the horizontal scroll bar and wraps the lines of text.
Sets AHK Studio as the default editor. May require the script to be ran as administrator.
Gives you an edit control to add whatever you want to be pre-populated when you create a new Project.
Gives you the ability to change the default Project folder when creating new Projects.
Allows you to adjust the amount of visual spaces for each tab indentation.
Use this to create, save, export, and import Themes. ![Theme.PNG](http://www.maestrith.com/files/AHKStudio/Theme.PNG)
Adds a margin to the left of the text.

menu.name: Q&uick Find Settings
menu.menu: Makes the search Case Sensitive.
Clears custom search areas created by "Set Selection".
Uses the Greed option in regex.
Makes the search a regex search.

menu.name: Copy Selected Text on Quick Find

menu.menu: When you hit the hotkey for Quick Find it will automatically populate the edit control with the currently selected text.
Creates a search selection based on what you have selected. Quick Find will only highlight the text that matches your search within this area.
Quick Find: Toggles Multi-Line.

menu.name: Formatting Options
menu.menu: Shows a Dialog so that you can edit the text that will be inserted when you use Toggle Comment Line (Defaults to ;).
When entering a , it will automatically add a space after it.
When entering a , it will automatically add a space before it.
When enabled and you press enter rather than tab to auto complete an item it will add a newline.
When creating comments this option will build another ; on top of any that are already there.
When scrolling down a large document the caret will stay centered vertically.
Hides the Indentation Guides (Look like vertical line of dots to show indentation).
Can be buggy! Highlights the current indentation.
Option: When you create an include using Create Include From Selection this will add the #Include line where the text was rather than in the main Project file.
Allows you to indent lines that start with (. , and or) however you like.
Requires you to hold Shift when creating a Breakpoint.
Highlights the current row your caret is in.
Shows EOL characters.
Shows the whitespace characters.
This will attempt to automatically delete matching ( ) { } [ ] etc but holding backspace to delete quickly will cause issues.

menu.name: Disable Auto Indent For Non Ahk Files

menu.menu: If you are editing a non-ahk file it will not adjust the indents.
When you have ( ) { } etc set to auto insert it will not do the Auto Complete.
Shows a list of items that you can then hit enter to have Auto-Completed.
Shows the Auto-Complete list when you are inside "" or also in comments.

menu.name: Auto Complete While Tips Are Visible

menu.menu: Shows the Auto-Complete list while the Context Sensitive Help tips are visible.

menu.name: Program Options
menu.menu: Runs scripts as admin (will cause a popup if you do not edit your UAC).
Asks if you are sure you want to overwrite the file.
Dialog to change the syntax of the ;auto_version
Resets the zoom to 0.
Reduces the size of the icons in the toolbars. Requires a Restart!
Moves the Quick Find above the Scintilla edit window.
Currently Unavailable.
Disables the auto save feature of AHK Studio on exit.
Stops AHK Studio from creating backups of your changed files.
When entering #Include and selecting the Auto-Complete in the dropdown it will not pop up and ask for a file.
The, by default, red and green rectangles next to the line to show what has been edited will not be visible.
Currently Unavailable.
When you save a program and it is still running it will kill the process.
This will backup all of the files in your project rather than just the include files that Full Backup will do.

menu.name: Check For Edited Files On Focus

menu.menu: If a file is edited while you are away from AHK Studio and focus is set back to it, it will popup with a dialog asking if you want to update your code to the new contents.
Dialog windows by default do not have margins. This will add them.
When using the Find window this option will close the Find window automatically.

menu.name: Auto Set Area On Quick Find

menu.menu: When using the Quick Find hotkey or Edit/Quick Find it will automatically set the selection to search in if you have text selected.
Hides the Vertical Scrollbars on all of your Scintilla controls.
Hides the Horizontal Scrollbars on all of your Scintilla controls.
Shows the Fuzzy Search value for the returned items.
By default when your cursor is (|) <--- within there and you type ) it will jump to the other side of the ) ()|, this disables that feature.
Hides the System Tray icon for AHK Studio.
When debugging it will give all of the information returned from the debugger.
When selecting words or your Caret is within a word it will only show/highlight complete matches.
When Debugging this will cause the current line to be selected (Moves the current Caret).
Creates global hotkeys for all of the Step operations.
When you hit Delete/Backspace and there is something like {text} it will not delete the { or } unless the text inside them is gone. It is to help stop you from accidentally deleting matching braces.

menu.name: Auto Check For Update On Startup

menu.menu: Will go to Github and check to see if I have pushed any updates to the program on startup.

menu.name: Explorer Menu Options
menu.menu: Displays the full tree in the Project Explorer for includes that are not in the main Projects directory.
Hides the file extensions in the Project Explorer.
Will not create the folder structure in the Project Explorer.
Will show a dialog to create a file rather than create an Untitled.ahk file.
Currently Unavailable.
For those who use a separate compiler.
Shows a small GUI that displays the functions you just used (Mostly for maestrith to make videos with).
Opens the Settings dialog with the Options tab displayed.
Shows/Hides the Word Wrap Indicators.
Enables/Disables the Context Sensitive Help.

menu.name: Fo&rmat
menu.menu: Plugin: Aligns selected text by a delimiter.
Removes the colored statuses from the margin.
When you have multiple selections it will remove the current one.
Moves all selected lines Down one line.
Moves all selected lines Up one line.
Sorts all selected text by a delimiter. (Use \ to sort by `n)
Dialog that will do its best to split your current document into functions and classes (not perfect).
When your Caret is near a brace that has a match it will be highlighted. Using this item will remove both of them.
Prevents the edit window from scrolling past the end of the document.
Removes spaces from around the commas in the selected text.
Moves a selected word to the right.
Will put " around the word that your Caret is currently in.
Moves a selected word to the left.

menu.name: &Commands
menu.menu: Creates/Removes a multiple line comment surrounding the selected text in /* and */.
Selects the word that your caret is in.
Displays Scintilla codes for you to select. If you have entered some text it will search for codes with that text in them.
Dialog to search for Scintilla codes.
Shows an Auto-Complete list with all of your code vault entries.
Creates a new caret in the line directly above the current caret.
Creates a caret in the line directly below the current caret.
Currently Unavailable.

menu.name: &Navigate
menu.menu: Displays the next file in your Project Explorer.
Displays the previous file in your Project Explorer.
Displays the previous Project in your Project Explorer.
Displays the next Project in your Project Explorer.
Jumps to the previous Include that you were editing.
Jumps to the next Include that was saved from the Back command.
When next to a brace it will highlight all text up until the matching brace.
Will place your caret after the next comma in that line.
Will place your caret after the previous comma in that line.

menu.name: &View
Refresh
menu.menu: Refreshes the information for Omni-Search for the current file.
Re-Indexes all of the files that you have opened.
Currently Unavailable.
Re-Indexes your lib files in the off chance the Functions/Classes stop coming up.
Refreshes the current Project if you change or remove an #Include in the text rather than doing it in Studios menus.
Re-Indexes all of your Projects and fixes errors in the Project Explorer.
Refreshes your plugins in the AHK Studio\Plugins directory.
Shows an Auto-Complete list of all of your Classes in the current project.
Expands all child nodes of a Projects Tree
Currently Unavailable.
Displays an Auto-Complete list of Functions in the current Project.
This will show all Scintilla codes that are in the current line.
Switches between your Scintilla Controls and also will switch to the Tracked Notes window if you have it.

menu.name: &Help
menu.menu: Opens the help file to the command that your cursor is in.
This Dialog.
Opens your default web browser to the AHK Studio Wiki.
Checks to see if there is an update for AHK Studio.
Help me out with a little donation.
Opens your web browser to the Github Issues page.

menu.name: Misc
menu.menu: Compiles the AHK Studio script so that you can have it in your Taskbar.
Downloads the source code for Studio if you have compiled it.
Opens the AHK Studio forum post.
Currently Unavailable.
Mostly for maestrith. Usually will just say Testing.
Basic information about AHK Studio.
Shows a list of all of the current hotkeys for AHK Studio.
